alert.note: Alert for Marinette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 10:42AM CDT until April 19 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Michigan... Wisconsin... Menominee River near Vulcan affecting Marinette, Dickinson and Menominee Counties. Menominee River near Niagara affecting Florence, Dickinson, Menominee and Marinette Counties. Menominee River near Florence affecting Florence, Dickinson and Iron Counties. For the Menominee River...including Twin Falls Dam-Iron Mountain, Florence, Vulcan, Niagara, Pembine, Menominee River at White Rapids Dam, Koss, McAllister...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near Vulcan. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, structures along the river along Homestead Road and Sturgeon Way Road may start to be impacted by flood waters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.2 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
